section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: Trade association for UK recycling and reprocessing industries and their supply chain. 1.    The Resource Association focuses on championing the value of UK reprocessing and recycling in terms of employment, resource efficiency and integrity, carbon reduction and our role in the low-carbon, green economy.  It works with Governments across the UK, the European Commission, other trade associations and stakeholders with shared interests.  Our member companies and organisations represent an estimated £3.3bn contribution to UK GDP, the recovery and recycling of over 7 million tonnes annually and the employment of over 12,500 people.  Further information at www.resourceassociation.com
relevant_communication:
